title: What's so great about partying on Ibiza? - Quora

response.answer_text: Whats great about partying in IBIZA, or being in IBIZA in general is the energy and the vibe, there is hardly anything serious going on in the Island, no huge hospitals, no big serious congresses, mostly people on their way to a party or coming from a party, or on the Island for yoga, spirituality , and mainly positive things, which means no sad , long faces of people on their way to work on public transport at 8 in the morning, mostly smiles.The weather is great, which makes it great for partying outdoors, in villas, in poolparty venues, on boats and Yachts, or just at giant raves , such as Ushuaia, ZOO , Cova Santa, and back in the days SPACE IBIZAThe Island only has 100k locals, but Ibiza has 11 million visitors per year, which means most people are there to visit, which is a different energy than for example a place with mostly just residents.Its only high season a few months a year, so its kind of like the world cup of partying, al lot of people that frequently visit Ibiza, you have the entire winter to look forward to that epic summer on the beautifull white Island, and when its there, its magicalIf youre into electronic music, the line ups are as good as the biggest electronic music festivals in the world, every big dj played in IBIZA!If youre not into electronic music, you still have more than enough options, there are spots where they play strictly rockmusic, latin music, hip hop and R&B, Grime, Live Concerts, regea, Spanish Music/ Pachanga, there is something for everyoneYou can party 24/7 all week long, there is Always a party somewhere, NEVER EVER a dull moment, from May 21st till Sept 21st at least, and then the big bang The Closing Weekend which is usually the first weekend of OctoberOff season parties are getting better and better, its not strange to end up in a private party in a Multi million dollar villa in January, with amazing music, and an amazing beautifull group of people, the next big thing is IBIZA Winter Season, getting better every year, but you need to be connectedIf youre a fan of djs and producers, its very easy to meet them, theyre usually open to meet up for a quick chat, and picture. No egos, and great vibes!The Beaches are amazing , more than 50, the beach of Playa Den Bossa in front of Bora Bora and Jet used to be one big party on sundays, BYOB, Salines is famous for a great vibe, and people love to hang out at the chiringitos, Beniras Beach on sundays is ONE BIG PARTY, hippies started it during the war in Vietnam as a protest, and it never stopped!The non party beaches are equally amazing, you can bring your own music , drink fresh mojitos and enjoy the vibe, My faves Cala Salada, Calla Bassa, Cala ConteThe Sunsets! Partying at Cafe Del Mar Mambo during sunset is huge 7 days a week, with surprise dj sets of some of the biggest djs in the world, you cant go wrong, Beniras sunset, and other locations are equally amazing, if you want to avoid massive crowds!I could go on forever, but you should go and check for yourself!!
